content.prompt: Which of the following is an environmental benefit associated with substituting ethanol for gasoline?

choices.label: Ethanol is more energy efficient than gasoline.
Ethanol has a lower cost than gasoline.
Burning ethanol produces fewer air pollutants than burning gasoline alone.
Burning ethanol removes carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
